testsuite.name: tests.SD3_Add_tems_To_Cart

testcase.name: test_SD3_AddI_tems_To_Cart
testcase.system-out: 1. Complete a successful login Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the STANDARD account 2. Locate 'Sauce Labs backpack' item 3. Click 'Add to Cart' button Element clicked Sauce Labs backpack added to cart. 4. Verify button changed to 'Remove' Element visible Element displayed Sauce Labs backpack remove button displayed. 5. Verify Shoppin cart badge changed to '1' Element visible Expected badge number: 1 Is the actual badge number: 1
